parameters.name: DBInstanceId
parameters.description: The ID of the instance. You can call the [DescribeDBInstances](~~610396~~) operation to query the ID of the instance.

parameters.name: EndTime
parameters.description:
The end of the time range to query. Specify the time in the ISO 8601 standard in the *yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ssZ* format. The time must be in UTC.**

> The end time must be later than the start time.

parameters.name: NodeId
parameters.description:
The ID of the node.

> This parameter is available only for instances that run RDS Cluster Edition. You can specify this parameter to query the logs of a specified node. If this parameter is not specified, the logs of the primary node are returned by default.

parameters.name: PageNumber
parameters.description: The page number. Pages start from page 1. Default value: 1.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries per page. Valid value: **30 to 200**. Default value: **30**.

parameters.name: SQLHASH
parameters.description: The unique ID of the SQL statement. The ID is used to obtain the slow query logs of the SQL statement.

parameters.name: StartTime
parameters.description: The beginning of the time range to query. Specify the time in the ISO 8601 standard in the *yyyy-MM-dd*T*HH:mm:ss*Z format. The time must be in UTC.
